Mercedes Marie Long

  1. Foster Name:
  2. Foster Family: Joseph and Catherine Slobodny
  3. Location of Family: Greeley, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Foundling Hospital
  5. Arrival Place: Greeley, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 9 mos.
  7. Date of Birth: 1910-09-26, New York City, NY
  8. Gender: female
  9. Married Name: Mercedes Marie Harmen
  10. Spouse Name: Harold Harmen
  11. Source: Charlotte Endorf and Sarah M. Endorf, By Train They Came: Fragile Excess Baggage vol. 2 (Denver: Outskirts Press, 2007), n.p.; National Orphan Train Complex; 1940 United States Federal Census.
